jQuery('#auto_suggest_terms_holder'+autocomplete.wrapperId+' .sbs_search_keyword_index'+autocomplete.wrapperId).removeClass('selected');\n                    this.className += this.className ? ' selected' : 'selected';\n\n                    jQuery('#sbs_search_autocomplete_right'+autocomplete.wrapperId+' .auto_suggest_product_holder').hide();\n                    jQuery('#auto_suggest_product_holder'+autocomplete.wrapperId+'_'+phraseNumber).show();\n                    jQuery('#sbs_search_view_all_link'+autocomplete.wrapperId).attr(\n                        'href', autocomplete.getSuggestionSearchUrl(term)\n                    );\n                }).on('mouseleave', function(){\n                    autocomplete.removeClass(this, 'selected');\n                }).on('click', function(){\n                    var term = this.getAttribute('data-item-term');\n                    autocomplete.getWrapperBlock().hide();\n                    window.location.href = autocomplete.getSuggestionSearchUrl(term);\n                });\n                jQuery('#sbs_search_closed_button'+autocomplete.wrapperId).on('click', function(){\n                    autocomplete.getWrapperBlock().hide();\n                });\n\n                jQuery('#sbs_search_autocomplete_right'+autocomplete.wrapperId+' .suggested-item').on('mouseenter', function(){\n                    jQuery('#sbs_search_autocomplete_right'+autocomplete.wrapperId+' .suggested-item').removeClass('selected');\n                    this.className += this.className ? ' selected' : 'selected';\n                }).on('mouseleave', function(){\n                    autocomplete.removeClass(this, 'selected');\n                }).on('click', function(){\n                    var productUrl = this.getAttribute('data-url');\n                    if (!productUrl) {\n                        return;\n                    }\n                    autocomplete.getWrapperBlock().hide();\n                    window.location.href = productUrl;\n                });\n                jQuery('#sbs_search_keyword_index'+autocomplete.wrapperId+'_0').trigger('mouseenter');\n            }\n        )\n    });\n</script>\n</div>\n<div class=\"split-line\">\n<strong>Need it,Click it,Done!</strong>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"browser-notice show-desktop hide-mobile\">\n<div class=\"bbyalert-header\">\n<div class=\"bbyalert-icon\"></div>\n<div class=\"bbyalert-text\">It looks like you're using an older version of browser.</div>\n<div class=\"clear\"></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"bbyalert-list\">\n<div class=\"message\">To best view our site — and for a better experience overall on the Web — please update your browser using the links below.       subCategoryName: new DukatMenuContainer(\n                'cat-name' + categoryId,\n                new DukatMenuDataSource('name', categoryDisplayHierarchyData,\n                    new DukatMenuUnderscoreTemplateRenderer(\n                        \"<% if (!_.isEmpty(data)) { %><h1><%= data %> Essentials</h1><% } %>\"\n                    )\n                )\n            ),\n DukatMenuSubCategoriesRenderer()),\n                categoryDisplayHierarchyData[categoryId]['popular_product']\n            ),\n            diy: new DukatMenuContainer(\n                'diy-cms-block' + categoryId,\n                new DukatMenuDataSource('diy_cms_block', categoryDisplayHierarchyData)\n            ),\n            promoArea: new DukatMenuContainer(\n       'promo_banner_block' + categoryId,\n                new DukatMenuDataSource('promo_banner_block', categoryDisplayHierarchyData)\n            )\n        }\n\n        var itemsSelector = '.category-nav .itemSubMenuWrapper.level1';\n        var categoryPathSubSelector = '.itemMenuName[category-path]';\n\n        var menuController = new DukatMenuCategoryController(menuContainers, new DukatMenuCurrentItemActionObserver())\n            .bindCategoryItemAction('mouseenter', 'activate', itemsSelector, categoryPathSubSelector)\n            .bindCategoryItemAction('mouseleave', 'deactivate', itemsSelector, categoryPathSubSelector)\n            .bindAction('mouseenter', 'activateDefault', '.category-nav .itemMenuNameDefaultWrapper')\n            .bindAction('mouseenter', 'activateDefault', '#menu' + categoryId);\n\n    }\n\n    function DukatMenuCurrentItemActionObserver()\n    {\n        this.before_activate = function (categoryPath) {\n            jQuery('.itemMenuName[category-path=' + categoryPath + ']').addClass('cur-arrow');\n        }\n\n        this.before_deactivate = function () {\n            jQuery('[category-path]').removeClass('cur-arrow');\n        }\n    }\n</script>\n<script type=\"text/javascript\"
